items.title: Liverpool midfielder Hobinger suffers ACL injury
items.summary: Liverpool confirm Austria midfielder Marie Hobinger suffered an anterior cruciate ligament injury against Manchester City last weekend.

items.title: Four-game ban? Well, OK but he's retired...

items.title: Google gadgets, ranked
items.summary: Is a smartwatch better than a smartphone? Not which one is more important or which would you rather have, but simply which one is better? This is the kind of question you really never need to ask - but we're here to ask it. Why? Because Google has had a terrific year of gadget launches, from Pixel â€¦

items.title: As Microsoft bids farewell to Windows 10, millions of users wonâ€™t
items.summary: Windows 10 is so popular that Windows 11 only overtook it in terms of usage just a few months ago. That's why I'm surprised that Microsoft is still, kind of, going ahead with its end of support cutoff today. At one point last year, I wasn't sure if Microsoft was actually going to end support for Wiâ€¦
